Description:
-------------
Title developed under the Unreal Engine 3, third-person action where we have to fight against countless evil creatures in a series of huge battlefields alone, or share gaming experiences with other users through their cooperative arrangements (for four players) and competitive (demons against humans).


Features:
* Addictive gameplay online and offline co-op for up to 4 players!
* Multiplayer versus mode! Human beings face the demons in the exciting game modes and different? Battle? and? Demonizer?.
* 8 large rooms with single-level events such as meteor showers and thunderstorms affecting the gameplay.
* More than 30 upgradeable weapons and concealed weapons and special items.
* Free updates and future DLC!
* Custom level support for the amendment!
* Powered by Unreal Engine 3.

OS: WD XP, Vista or WD WD 7

Memory: 2 GB of RAM
